column1: Table 6 24: Total Cost Estimate for Stream Reservation Proposals

column4: Problem to be addressed / Recommendation
Soil erosion of lands on both sides. Recommend planting two rows of areca nut seedlings, Gliricidia, and pepper/ Betel creepers for a distance of 200m mixed with riparian plants.

Soil erosion of lands on both sides is about 750 m in length. Recommend 1. Construct (3mx2mx1m) three SABO-boulder dams across the stream. 2. Make dense planting of mixed vegetation comprising Areca nut trees /Kumbuk/Mee/ Godapara / Kaduru / Aththikka/Wal del/Kekuna randomly mixed seedlings at 500 mm grid interval.2. Apply mulching, organic manure and NPK fertilizer. Covered area 600 m2

Soil erosion of lands on both sides is about 700m in length. Recommend 1. Construct (2mx2mx1m) two SABO-boulder dams across the stream where the canal is steep. 2. Make dense planting of mixed vegetation comprising Areca nut trees /Kumbuk/Mee/ Godapara/Kaduru/Aththikka/Wal del/Kekuna randomly mixed seedlings at 500 mm grid interval.2. Apply mulching, organic manure and NPK fertilizer. Covered area 300 m2

column3: Torrent at the boundary of Karagaskada South and Karagaskada North
column4: Soil erosion of lands on both sides and discarding wastes to the torrent. Recommend 1. To plant two rows of areca nut seedlings, Gliricidia and pepper/ Betel creepers for a distance of 250m mixed with riparian plants and vetiver grass at edges. 2. To construct a garbage trap with a 600mm Dia concrete pipe culvert structure with a 2m x1m x 1m Gabian box as a debris collector.
